story:
Once upon a time, in the enchanting land of Armenia, there lived a young boy named Aram. Aram was a kind and brave young soul, known for his love of adventure and exploration. One moonlit night, as Aram lay in bed gazing out of his window at the stars twinkling in the night sky, he heard a soft rustling sound coming from the garden.

Curious, Aram tiptoed out of his room and followed the gentle sound until he reached the garden. There, under the shimmering light of the moon, stood a majestic golden bird with wings that shimmered like the sun. The bird spoke in a voice as soothing as a gentle breeze, "Greetings, young Aram. I am Garun, the mythical bird of joy and happiness. I have come to take you on a magical journey through the night sky."

Excited and filled with wonder, Aram climbed onto Garun's back, and with a graceful flap of its wings, they soared up into the starlit sky. They flew over snow-covered mountains, lush green forests, and sparkling rivers, each more beautiful than the last. As they flew, Garun shared tales of ancient Armenia, of heroes and legends, of wisdom and courage.

As the night wore on, Aram felt a sense of peace and joy fill his heart. He realized that there was magic and wonder all around him, waiting to be discovered. Finally, as dawn approached, Garun gently landed back in Aram's garden. With a warm smile, Garun bade Aram farewell, promising to visit him in his dreams whenever he needed a dash of magic in his life.

With a heart full of gratitude, Aram returned to his room and climbed into bed. He closed his eyes, drifting off into a peaceful slumber, knowing that the world was full of adventure and that magic awaited him at every turn.

And so, dear child, remember to always keep your heart open to the wonders of the world, for you never know when a magical adventure might come knocking at your door. Goodnight, sweet dreams, and may your heart be forever filled with joy and happiness.
